name: floatplane
description: Library for interfacing with the LMG Floatplane.com api

scripts.test-all: jest auth.test --runInBand && jest api.test creator.test user.test video.test
scripts.tsc: tsc && copy /Y package.json dist && copy /Y README.md dist && copy /Y .npmignore dist
scripts.send: npm run tsc && cd ./dist && npm publish
scripts.send-dry: npm run tsc && cd ./dist && npm publish --dry-run

author: Inrix
